ago, I had attended a seminar on "Development for Testing".

e the version was 3.x something.

Now, the download available on the offici=
al website of JUnit is version 4.3
(I downloaded JUnit 4.3 las week...)

am not even sure whether there is a gui in JUnit 4.3

ndependently of any of the GUIs like Eclipse or NetBeans either on command =
line or through a GUI

ased on version 3.8

Please help!=
!!


Regards,

Umesh
